JOB DESCRIPTION: Ideal candidates will have five years of experience and be a demonstrated self-starter. Experience working with distributed teams greatly preferred.     Required Skills:      5 years of experience writing Python and Javascript: Nodejs, ES5, ES6 a plus.   2-5 years of experience writing unit tests in PyUnit, Mocha/Chai etc.   2 years of experience working with restful APIs.      Experience Desired but not required:      Experience working with Postman for API testing and API mocking.   Experience with Mobile Application development and testing (iOS and Android)   Experience in C or Golang   Bash or shell scripting
